headline: ValueMomentum Designated as Leader and Star Performer in Everest Group's P&C Insurance IT Services PEAK Matrix
summary: ValueMomentum, a leading solutions provider exclusively focused on serving property and casualty (P&C) insurers, announced today that it was recognized as a Leader and a Star Performer in Everest Group's 2025 P&C Insurance IT Services PEAK Matrix速 report. This PEAK Matrix速 profiles 31 IT services providers for the P&C insurance industry, evaluating them on characteristics including market impact, vision, and capabilities across key dimensions.
